- ✅ Home.vue (complete landing page)

- ✅ Register.vue (sign-up form)

- ✅ Vue Router configured with 3 routes

- ✅ Tailwind CSS v4 fully migrated

├── styles/

## Ready for Phase 4?

### Phase 4: Testing & Finalization

Once you confirm readiness, Phase 4 will include:

1. **Full Functionality Testing**
   - Test all routes (/, /login, /register)
   - Verify mobile menu interactions
   - Check form functionality
   - Test navigation links

2. **Visual Regression Testing**
   - Compare with original Next.js version
   - Verify responsive design
   - Check animations and transitions
   - Ensure styling matches exactly

3. **Browser & Device Testing**
   - Desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
   - Mobile devices (iOS, Android)
   - Tablet devices
   - Various screen sizes

4. **Accessibility & Performance**
   - Check ARIA labels
   - Verify keyboard navigation
   - Optimize performance if needed
   - Ensure accessibility standards

5. **Final Cleanup**
   - Fix any issues found
   - Remove unused code/files
   - Document any known limitations
   - Prepare for deployment

## Next Actions

**Ready to test the Vue.js application!**

To test the application:
```bash
npm run dev
```

This will start the development server (typically on `http://localhost:5173`)

Visit:
- `http://localhost:5173/` - Landing page
- `http://localhost:5173/login` - Login page
- `http://localhost:5173/register` - Register page
